home.description:
I am a young independent French developer. I do Minecraft mods, Discord bots, and content creation

My Backrooms mod being the most popular one with more than 1k downloads in less than a year.
home.socials: Find Lumaa on the internet here:

usmp.body: The Unknown SMP is a private Minecraft server half-scripted half-survival, created by Lumaa and Patate Givrée. The Unknown SMP is entirely running in The Backrooms, mod also by Lumaa (V-Fast).
